name: Lightspeed Zephyr
description:
Lightspeed Zephyr(LZ) is a top down arcade shooter made  for the 2018 Spring Unreal4 Jam! At it's core LZ uses a transforming spaceship with varying strengths to combat waves of enemies.   Featuring nearly 100% in house made assets LZ is an ambitious attempt  by a team who have never made a game in Unreal.  

Team:

Kendall Wix - Kendallwixb@yahoo.com

Johny Westfall - Jwestfa0@email.cpcc.edu

Joshua Moore - JMooregd@gmail.com

Rick Tucker - rick@rick-tucker.net (Site coming soon!)

Eulises Orellana - eulisesorellana21@ymail.com

Programs used:

  • Photoshop
  • Illustrator
  • Unreal Engine
  • Maya
  • Substance Painter
  • Visual Studios
  • Far Cry 4 Map Editor (Really)
  • Audacity

Third party assets:

  • Portal Soundtrack - https://freesound.org/people/neizvestnost/sounds/205198/?page=3#comment
  • Lonely Troutman II Soundtrack - YouTube Audio Library
  • Take You Home - YouTube Audio Library
  • Ethnocentric Font- https://www.dafont.com/ethnocentric.font
  • Zeros Font - https://www.dafont.com/zero-threes.font

Bug disclaimer: 

  • No energy bar functionality
  • AI collide into each other
